alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hardin County through 700 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Savannah, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Pickwick Landing State Park, Adamsville, Walnut Grove, Olive Hill, Pickwick Dam, Shiloh, Crump, Counce, Lowryville, Hamburg, Pollards Mill, Phillips, Bruton Branch, Pittsburg Landing, Childers Hill, Center Star, Maddox, Hurley and Walkertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
